attributes.action: Declare the EU referendum result null and void.
attributes.background: The electorate were canvassed reasons to remain and leave the European Union with inaccurate and erroneous statements. The degree of inaccuracy was unreasonable for a coherent decision to be made.

rejection.details: Apologies, the link we previously sent was incorrect. We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
